    • isValidPassword

      public static boolean isValidPassword(String password) throws exceptions.password.LengthException, exceptions.password.NoUpperAlphaException, exceptions.password.NoLowerAlphaException, exceptions.password.NoDigitException, exceptions.password.NoSpecialCharacterException, exceptions.password.InvalidSequenceException
      checks if password is valid by serious of test
      Parameters:
      password - - password of user
      Returns:
      false - if password fails tests, true otherwise
      Throws:
      exceptions.password.LengthException - - if password is less than 6 characters
      exceptions.password.NoUpperAlphaException - - if password has no upper case alpha
      exceptions.password.NoLowerAlphaException - - if password has no lower case alpha
      exceptions.password.NoDigitException - - if password has no digit
      exceptions.password.NoSpecialCharacterException - - if password has no special character
      exceptions.password.InvalidSequenceException - - if password has 3 or more characters in a sequence

    • isWeakPassword

      public static boolean isWeakPassword(String password) throws exceptions.password.WeakPasswordException
      checks if password is between 6 - 9 characters
      Parameters:
      password - - password of user
      Returns:
      false - if password is not between 6 - 9 characters
      Throws:
      exceptions.password.WeakPasswordException - - if password is between 6 - 9 characters

      Parameters:
      passwords - - the list of passwords from user
      Returns:
      array list of invalid passwords

    • comparePasswords

      public static void comparePasswords(String password, String passwordConfirm) throws exceptions.password.UnmatchedException
      checks if password matches with confirm password
      Parameters:
      password - - first password from user
      passwordConfirm - - second password from user
      Throws:
      exceptions.password.UnmatchedException - - if passwords do not match

    • comparePasswordsWithReturn

      public static boolean comparePasswordsWithReturn(String password, String passwordConfirm)
      checks if password matches with confirm password
      Parameters:
      password - - first password from user
      passwordConfirm - - second password from user
      Returns:
      true - if password matches passwordConfirm, false otherwise
